Body: I'm the beginner of computer programming. I got Arduino Uno with 3g Shield. I want to get in Iot Project with these things. But I cannot figure out what to start, especially, I don know how to communicate Arduino with smartphone(Android). Also, I will work on Android Studio. I really need help. It doesn't matter, if it becomes real time communication or file type... etc. I just want to know how to communicate with smartphone and Arduino. Hope you guys answer me. Thanks!
what do you mean? do you want to communicate with your smartphone via mobile internet or what?

and do you think you are ready for this? as a beginner in computer programming"?? or shouldn't you start with some basics first? if you have no idea where to start or how to find such information on the internet you are most likely not ready for such a project. it's a nice long term goal
column9: but I definitely advise you to do a few more basic tutorials

Body: I want to make the Arduino to communicate with smartphone via 3G(mobile Internet).
